content: the shell crochet tank top pattern is simple stylish modern and easy to make it s a simple two panel construction just sewn together at the end the top is easily customized as a crop top or dress just make more or less row this crochet top pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl as well as a follow along video tutorial materials #0 lace/2ply weight yarn i used holst garn coast #0 lace weight yarn 3mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle stitch marker skill easy notes this pattern is written in english us terminology this pattern made in us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small this top is worked flat in 2 pieces from the top down and then sewn together the front and back panel are made the same this pattern is in a multiples of 6+2 chain this pattern is a 2 row repeat row 3 and 4 yarn needed 630 690 760 830 900 960 yards gauge blocked 4 5 shell st x 15 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 16 88 body width across x 16 length s = 17 77 body width across x 16 53 length m = 19 55 body width across x 17 60 length l = 21 33 body width across x 18 13 length xl = 23 11 body width across x 19 20 length xxl = 24 body width across x 19 73 length
